p: While earlier ECoVs neurological complexities did not appear to arise simultaneously with respiratory manifestations, instead exhibited delay by 14–21 days, in the COVID-19, most neurologic manifestations occur as early as the first two days; further, neurologic symptoms emerging as an important differential diagnosis for COVID-19 [15], [21]. Considering that, the neurologist must familiarise themself with general ECoV manifesting symptoms and signs rather than concentrating on neurological manifestation only.
